text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf and her fellow<n>students are staying at a
seaside<n>facility for the summer training camp.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Phew... That's it for today's training<n>regimen.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The camp has only just begun, so<n>better safe than sorry. I
should go for<n>a cooldown walk.
choice_data_list: How about we go explore a bit, then?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha, you certainly make a tempting<n>offer. Very well then—I
could use the<n>company.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The mind needs breaks too, after all.<n>There should be a
seaside cafe<n>nearby, if you're feeling as peckish<n>as I am.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We wrap up Symboli Rudolf's training<n>and head for lunch.
Then, later that<n>evening...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, good evening, Trainer. Working in<n>your free time?
You're certainly<n>dedicated.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I was conducting a light patrol of the<n>camp. ...Perhaps I have
too much time<n>on my hands.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Although, I suppose it's a good thing<n>that there are no
issues to demand my<n>attention...
Aaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Wh-what was that scream?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Let's go! I pray nothing is wrong!
Aaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The screams are coming from more<n>than one direction!
What in the world<n>is going on?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... That last screamcame from somewhere around here...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I don't understand. I'm sure I heard<n>someone here just
moments ago...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Please... be safe, everyone.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Bwaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: What?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Whoa! P-president?! I'm so<n>sorry—I thought you were
a classmate!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
We're so, so, so sorry! A bunch of us<n>were goofing off,
trying to scare each<n>other. I don't even know where to<n>
start apologizing...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You were scaring each other? ...So, no<n>one is hurt or in
danger?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: No...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! What a relief! If nothing else,you certainly did a great job ofspooking me!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: U-um... President Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha... Ah, it's nothing. I'm just<n>happy you're making
the most of<n>your time together.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: My apologies for interrupting your<n>game. Please, carry on.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Is something the matter? You all<n>seem rather lost for
words...
choice_data_list: Maybe they thought they were in for a scolding.
Maybe they thought they were in for a scolding.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A scolding? But they've done nothing<n>wrong. This is their
own free<n>time—why shouldn't they use it as<n>they see fit?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
We're all students. There's more to<n>our lives than racing
and training, and<n>the times we spend together will<n>serve
as a vital springboard for the<n>future.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Besides, each day of our lives comes<n>but once. During a
special event like<n>this camp, who wouldn't want to<n>make
fun memories to look back on?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Even I... Haha. Yes, I would be lying if<n>I were to claim I
didn't enjoy these<n>little everyday moments.
choice_data_list: Then why not ask if you can join them?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haha. Now, now. You know I can't<n>impose on them like that.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Pay my trainer's words no mind,<n>everyone. We've a long
camp ahead<n>of us, so you should take this<n>opportunity to
recharge—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: U-um! President Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
If it's all right with you... Would you,<n>you know, care to join
us?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...Are you sure?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Y-yes! Only if it's no trouble, though!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Trouble? Perish the thought. Hehe... I<n>would be delighted to
join you!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Alpha Team, report.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Yes, ma'am! Preparations are<n>complete, and everyone's in
position!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Excellent. Next, Bravo Team, make<n>your way to the staging
area. Stay<n>alert for any lurking dangers.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Once you locate an ideal spot, hide<n>yourselves. You know
what to do after<n>that, correct?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Yep! We jump out and give the<n>others a good scare!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Superb. Best of luck, and let's scare<n>up some good fun.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Roger that!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Is that really so surprising? I want<n>this spook-off to be a
runaway<n>success.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It would be a shame if we didn't put<n>forth our best effort for
the<n>participants. A team effort will<n>maximize the scare
factor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha... You know, you're right. I've<n>never had this much
fun at a training<n>camp before.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Thus begins an event that will go<n>down in history as the
camp's most<n>thrilling spook-off.
